content.summary: A secure, cross-platform digital banking app built on React Native and Node.js offering real-time financial management and regulatory compliance.
content.description: This product modernizes personal finance by providing a secure mobile banking experience. It integrates real-time transaction tracking, biometric security, and financial wellness tools like budgeting and savings goals, backed by a robust Node.js/PostgreSQL architecture ensuring data integrity.

user_stories.title: Biometric Authentication
user_stories.story: As a user, I want to log in using FaceID or Fingerprint so that I can access my account securely without typing a password.
user_stories.description: Implement React Native biometric libraries linked to Node.js auth tokens. Fallback to PIN required.
acceptance_criteria: User can enable FaceID/TouchID in settings
Successful biometric scan logs user in
Three failed attempts prompt for PIN/Password

user_stories.title: Real-time Account Dashboard
user_stories.story: As a user, I want to view my account balance and recent transactions so that I know my current financial standing.
user_stories.description: Fetch balance and last 5 transactions from PostgreSQL via secure API endpoint.
acceptance_criteria: Balance is formatted with currency symbol

user_stories.title: Internal Money Transfer
user_stories.story: As a user, I want to transfer funds between my accounts so that I can manage my money distribution.
user_stories.description: Transactional logic in Node.js ensuring ACID compliance in PostgreSQL.
acceptance_criteria: User selects source and destination accounts

user_stories.title: Savings Goal Tracker
user_stories.story: As a user, I want to set a savings goal and track progress so that I can save for specific purchases.
user_stories.description: CRUD operations for savings goals with visual progress bars in UI.
acceptance_criteria: User can create a goal with name and amount
Progress bar updates as funds are allocated

user_stories.title: Transaction Push Notifications
user_stories.story: As a user, I want to receive alerts for account activity so that I can detect unauthorized usage immediately.
user_stories.description: Integration with Firebase Cloud Messaging triggered by backend events.
acceptance_criteria: Alert sent for debits over defined threshold
Deep link takes user to transaction details

acceptance_criteria.criteria: All financial data must be encrypted at rest using AES-256.
acceptance_criteria.description: Database level encryption for sensitive columns.
acceptance_criteria.title: Data Encryption

acceptance_criteria.criteria: API responses must complete within 500ms for 95% of requests.
acceptance_criteria.title: API Latency

acceptance_criteria.criteria: Application must comply with GDPR and local banking regulations.
acceptance_criteria.description: Data retention and deletion policies implemented.
acceptance_criteria.title: Regulatory Compliance

acceptance_criteria.criteria: UI must support dynamic text sizing for accessibility.
acceptance_criteria.title: Accessibility

assumptions: Users possess smartphones with biometric hardware.
Third-party banking APIs are available for core banking core integration.
Regulatory approval is granted for the target launch region.

gaps.impact: Users must use other apps to check credit health.
Cannot view cached balance without internet.
